item.title: Replacing Jupyter with Orgmode
item.description: Background I dislike Jupyter notebooks (and JupyterHub) a lot EIN is really not much of a solution either In the past I have written some posts on TeX with JupyterHub and discussed ways to use virtual Python with JupyterHub in a more reasonable manner. However, I personally found that EIN was a huge pain to work with, and I mostly ended up working with the web-interface anyway. It is a bit redundant to do so, given that at-least for my purposes, the end result was a LaTeX document.
